sentence: They have a great selection and the wait staff are friendly
I remember asking another guest where she purchased her beach mats and the employee over heard me and brought us two mats for free
Concierge was also extremely helpful to us and helped us plan and get to several events including providing a rental car for us from the hotel
We asked to be moved after we woke up and was helped by an extremely helpful employee that made sure we were taken care of
Check in at the hotel and the staff was great
We did have good experiences with some friendly staff
beautiful property very busy location walk to whalers vilagebeautiful property location but staff service levels not good enough for 4 star hotel or the price of room
During our check out receptionist was very acomodating and courteous forgot to get her name
Friendly service in a top location

What my wife and I arrived at this hotel we had to cross the line of striking employees
I always like staying at this property but unfortunately the employees were on strike
